text:
[Verse]
Got my shoes on running
To the light that's brightened
Every day's a battle
But I keep on fighting

[Verse 2]
Morning sun is glowing
Feel the warmth it's showing
Winds of change are coming
And my heart is growing

[Chorus]
Chasing sunshine
Catch those rays and hold tight
Dancing in the daylight
Everything will be alright

[Verse 3]
Clouds may come and cover
Sometimes make you shiver
But the light will break through
Shine a path to follow

[Bridge]
In the darkest hour
Feel your inner power
Keep the faith and stay strong
This day won't be long

[Chorus]
Chasing sunshine
Catch those rays and hold tight
Dancing in the daylight
Everything will be alright
title: Chasing Sunshine
